text: Pierre Lacotte (4 April 1932 â€“ 10 April 2023) was a French ballet dancer, choreographer (dance designer), teacher, and company director. He specialised in the reconstruction of lost choreographies of romantic ballets. He died on 10 April 2023, six days after his 91st birthday.
